casebody.data:
[Civ. No. 5692. First Appellate District, Division Two. August 16, 1928.] WILLIAM J. FITZHUGH, etc., Respondent, v. ORVILL Y. FREEMAN et al., Appellants.

Knight, Boland & Christin for Appellants.

Wyckoff & Gardner for Respondent.

STURTEVANT, J.

Except as to the amounts the facts are parallel with the facts in the case of Granite Rock Co. v. Freeman et al., ante, p. 507 [269 Pac. 668. For the reasons there stated the judgment is affirmed.

Nourse, J., and Buck, P. J., pro tem., concurred.
